content: The current "migration crisis" at the border is just something Trump invented because it fits with his racist agenda. Look at how current levels compare to 2000. ,https://,theconversation.com/todays-us-mexi,co-border-crisis-in-6-charts-98922, ,…,pic.twitter.com/9uTCwohwQu

"In terms of numbers, there is no 'crisis' at the border. Undocumented migration from Mexico is over, and irregular movements from El Salvador, Guatemala and Honduras are small by historical standards."
